DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Rubus occidentalis extract could improve fast postprandial serum glucose level , relate metabolic marker among patient prediabetes ( impaired fasting glucose and/or impair glucose tolerance ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Rubus Occidentalis Extract Plasma Glucose Levels Subject With Prediabetes
DOC.criteria: 19 year age old prediabetes ( fast plasma glucose 100125mg/dl , and/or post 75g OGTT plasma glucose 140199mg/dl ) pregnant woman take antihyperglycemic agent within 3 month time enrollment history heart failure , myocardial infarction , cerebral infarction uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic BP > 160mmHg , diastolic BP > 100mmHg ) serum triglyceride level > 500mg/dl kidney dysfunction ( serum Creatinine > 30 % upper normal limit ) hepatic dysfunction ( AST , ALT > 3 time upper normal limit ) take systemic glucocorticoid within 1 month
